players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is dead, so we have 3 left: me, Bob, Charlie. Mafia is still among us. Let's discuss."
Charlie: "I agree, Diana's death confirms mafia is active. We should share any suspicions or observations from yesterday's interactions."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I investigated Diana last night and she was the detective. Why would Bob claim to investigate me when Diana was the one who died?"
Bob: "Charlie is lying. Diana was killed, so she couldn't have been investigated. Only I could have investigated Charlie last night. Vote Charlie out now."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Diana? That seems like a poor first-night choice."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
